dict.string: Find Me needs access to Bluetooth to find and connect with nearby users based on their device proximity.
Find Me uses Bluetooth to detect and connect with nearby users by identifying their devices.
Find Me requires your location to find nearby users and allow them to interact with your profile, even when the app is running in the background.
Find Me needs your location access at all times to enable continuous nearby user discovery and interactions, even when the app is not in use.
Find Me uses your location while the app is open to discover and connect with nearby users.
Find Me needs access to your camera for capturing and uploading images to update your profile pictures or add photos to your business card.
Find Me requires microphone access for recording voice messages and other audio content to share with users.
Find Me needs access to your photo library for uploading images to update profile pictures for different profiles or to add a photo to your business card.
Find Me needs access to your photo library to upload images for updating your profile pictures or adding photos to your business card.
